DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which the RECIST best overall disease response value (CR, PR, PD, or SD) was recorded.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having the most positive qualities._Including everything._A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._Response; a bodily process occurring due to the effect of some foregoing stimulus or agent.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having the most positive qualities.:Including everything.:A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

Property.preferredDefinition: Response is any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

Concepts.definition: Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: RECIST:Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
